COMMENT_TX: Tommy John left with unknown injury
$Dwight Evans called for interference
ej,houkr101,M,clara901,Balls and strikes $Red Sox manager Ralph Houk ejected by HP umpire Al Clark for arguing balls and strikes
ej,boonb001,P,clara901,Arguing that DP grounder was foul off foot $Boone ejected by HP umpire Clark for arguing that grounder hit his foot and therefore there should have been no DP
timing assumed
game delayed at 9:42 due to a light failure in LF; 20 minute delay
Debut game for Curt Brown
Wayne Tolleson injured in collision with Ron Jackson at HP

ej,folit001,P,johnm901,Charging mound $Tim Foli fouled off the second pitch that was up and in; he charged the mound and traded punches with pitcher Larry Gura; both benches cleared; Foli ejected by HP umpire Mark Johnson; Foli was then charged with the strikeout due to the 0-2 count when he was replaced
Debut game for Mike Brown
ej,mcnaj801,M,garcr901,Arguing batter was out of box $Angels manager McNamara ejected by HP umpire Garcia for arguing that Lemon should be called out for being out ofmbox
ej,mcnaj801,M,garcr901,Balls and strikes Angels manager John McNamara ejected by HP umpire Richie Garcia

ej,burlr001,P,kaisk901,Fighting $Angels Burleson, not in game, ejected by HP umpire Kaiser when he charged out of dugout and tackled pitcher Clark; benches cleared and Burleson suffered dislocated right shoulder when tackled by SS Owen

ej,clarb001,P,kaisk901,Fighting ej,carer001,P,kaisk901,Fighting ej,cowea001,P,kaisk901,Fighting $Carew, and pitcher Clark ejected by HP umpire Kaiser for fighting; as he ran past the mound after grounding out, Carew exchanged words with the pitcher and they began to fight; both benches emptied again; Cowens of the Mariners, who was on the DL, ran out of clubhouse to join the brawl wearing his underwear and shower shoes
SB may be with Griffey at bat
$Willie Randolph called for interference for running into his own batted ball
WP may be with Randolph at bat
$Both teams warned about brushback pitches sometime in first inning
